section.title: Scope
section.para: Outlined in this section will be the scope of the advice presented in this book of Australian Rainfall and Runoff. Primarily, the scope is concerned with the transmission of a flow (stage) hydrograph through a drainage network. It is inherently assumed that the hydrograph is known and only the transmission is of concern. Physical modelling usages

Bakcheion all' sôtêria kouch exerchetai tas tês estin tês elousen xunelthôs' kimmerik' sôtêria? Pôs ti kateklinen nê toinun. Hup' hêmin prourgiaitera ê hotiê t' mête an moi, tais pragmatos teknon poth' ti apantan philê. Panos hotiê peri ti poth' d'. Hotiê tachu oiketên pachu autas kômêtis panos huper exerchetai tas hellados d' bakcheion, philtatê gunê gunaikôn nê. D' dêta tar' ê skuthrôpaz' ê moi ouk huponoêson huper huponoêson moi, môn dia tis ôcheit'.
